name: get_low_stock_items
description: Retrieves inventory items that are at or below their minimum stock threshold and need restocking attention

location.description: Filter by warehouse or store location (optional)

name: get_expiring_products
description: Identifies products with upcoming expiration dates that require immediate attention for sale, discount, or disposal

days_ahead.description: Number of days to look ahead for expiring items

product_type.description: Filter by product type such as 'perishable', 'pharmaceutical', 'cosmetic' (optional)

include_expired.description: Whether to include already expired items

name: get_overstock_alerts
description: Returns items with excessive inventory levels that may tie up capital or require promotional action

threshold_percentage.description: Percentage above optimal stock level to trigger alert (e.g., 150 for 50% overstocked)

minimum_value.description: Minimum dollar value of overstock to include in results (optional)

name: get_quality_control_items
description: Retrieves items flagged for quality control review, damaged goods, or customer return issues requiring attention

days_pending.description: Filter items pending review for more than specified days (optional)
